bibl.title: Movements and Markets in the First Millennium. Information, Containers, and Shipwrecks.
bibl.note: Paper delivered at the Spring Symposium held at Dumbarton Oaks, 2-4 May 2008. - See in part. pp. 69-72: vineyards, winepresses, camel caravans in the Negev (to the port of Gaza) and in Egypt.
bibl.seg: Michael McCormick, Movements and Markets in the First Millennium. Information, Containers, and Shipwrecks.
Cécile Morrisson (ed.), Trade and Markets in Byzantium = Dumbarton Oaks Byzantine Symposia and Colloquia (Washington, D.C., 2012) pp. 51-98, 1 tabl., 15 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Paper delivered at the Spring Symposium held at Dumbarton Oaks, 2-4 May 2008. - See in part. pp. 69-72: vineyards, winepresses, camel caravans in the Negev (to the port of Gaza) and in Egypt.
